text: Two hens were fighting over the chickens' preference, and finally one got the other one running. Resignedly the defeated retreated to a forest, hiding there. Instead, the proud victor climbed a high cliff and began to sing with great thunder. But it didn't take long for an eagle to fall on him and kidnap him. Since then, the rooster that had lost the fight has taken the whole henhouse. He who boasts of his own successes will soon find out who will take it away.
title: El águila y los gallos
author: nan Esopo
